anya-e1207n0:12_0: Tahiṃ, tahiṃ suvitthiṇṇaṃ jinassa caritaṃ hitaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:46_0: Dhanasāraṃ ihaṃ gayha gantuṃ yuttanti me pana.
anya-e1207n0:106_0: Iti taṃ janataṃ pucchi kasmā sodhetha añjasaṃ.
anya-e1207n0:118_0: Iti sotassa so tassa sukhaṃ dento jano’braviṃ.
anya-e1207n0:124_0: Labhitvā visamaṃ ṭhānaṃ samaṃ kātuṃ samārabhi.
anya-e1207n0:137_0: Dīgharattāma’laṃ taṃ me hitāya ca sukhāya ca;
anya-e1207n0:144_0: Saṅghassa navako hutvā paviseyyaṃ puraṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1207n0:147_0: Ayaṃ buddho’va’haṃ buddho hutvā loke anuttaro.
anya-e1207n0:160_0: Āgantvāna tahiṃ ṭhānaṃ isiṃ paṅke nipannakaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:169_0: Idaṃ vatvāna katvāna sasaṅgho taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:185_0: Kimuddhaṃ vā adho vā’pi disāsu vidisāsu ca.
anya-e1207n0:193_0: Saṃsāre saṃsaranto so bahuṃ dukkhaṃ titikkhiya;
anya-e1207n0:206_0: Kampayitvā mahiṃ dento sute cā’pi sakaṅgatāva.
anya-e1207n0:402_0: Modiṃsu jalajā tasmiṃ jantavo pahasiṃsu ca.
anya-e1207n0:438_0: “Jāto kira mahārāja putto te nuttaro sudhi.
anya-e1207n0:451_0: Phāleyyamuddhā khalu tāpasassa paggayha so añjalimuttamassa;
anya-e1207n0:454_0: Disvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ narindo devātidevassa sakatrajassa;
anya-e1207n0:457_0: Yadā’si rañño puthuvappamaṅgalaṃ tadā puraṃ devapuraṃ’va sajjitaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:458_0: Vibhūsitā tā janatā manoramā samāgatā tassa niketamuttamaṃ.
anya-e1207n0:460_0: Vibhūsitaṅgo janatāhi tāhi so purakkhato bhūsanabhūsitatrajaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:464_0: Sayāpayitvā bahimaṅgalaṃ taṃ udikkhituṃ dhātigaṇā gamiṃsu.
anya-e1207n0:467_0: Nisajja dhīro sayane manuññe’jhānaṃ samāpajji katāvakāso.
anya-e1207n0:469_0: Suvaṇṇabimbaṃ viya taṃ nisinnaṃ chāyañca tassā ṭhitame’va disvā;
anya-e1207n0:473_0: Savandanaṃ me dutiya’nti vatvā puttassa pāde sirasā’bhivandi.
anya-e1207n0:508_0: Sudassanīyaṃ viya nandanaṃ vanaṃ manoramuyyānama’gā mahāyaso.
anya-e1207n0:539_0: Rājentaṃ sataraṃsi’ṃva rājaṃ disvā kathe si’daṃ.
anya-e1207n0:541_0: “Yesaṃ sūnu ayaṃ dhīro yā ca jāyā imassa tu;
anya-e1207n0:542_0: Te sabbe nibbutā nūna sadā’nūnaguṇassa ve”.
anya-e1207n0:544_0: Itī’disaṃ giraṃ sutvā manuññaṃ tāya bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:547_0: Sītalaṃ vimalaṃ hāriṃ hāraṃ taṃ rativaḍḍhanaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:575_0: So channo patigaṇhitvā taṃ giraṃ tena bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:581_0: Pattharitvāna gacchantaṃ saddaṃ taṃ sakalaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e1207n0:582_0: Sabbe suragaṇā tasmiṃ sotuṃ nā’daṃsu kassaci.
anya-e1207n0:585_0: Passitvā paṭhamaṃ gantvā pacchā buddho bhavāma’haṃ.
anya-e1207n0:605_0: Samattho assa ko tassā jahituṃ dehasampadaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:609_0: Iti abravi channo so bhūpālassa yasassino.
anya-e1207n0:624_0: Bhaveyya vivaṭaṃ dvāraṃ yena kenaci no sace.
anya-e1207n0:633_0: Tassa cittaṃ viditvāna moditā gamane subhe;
anya-e1207n0:639_0: “Mā nikkhami mahāvīra ito te sattame dine;
anya-e1207n0:646_0: Gaccha tvami’dha mā tiṭṭha na’mhi rajjenamatthiko.
anya-e1207n0:673_0: Itthaṃ tamhi pathe ramme vattamāne mahāmahe;
anya-e1207n0:701_0: Patvā rājagahaṃ dhīro piṇḍāya cari subbato.
anya-e1207n0:706_0: Ko’yaṃ sakko nukho brahmā māro nāgo’tiādinā;
anya-e1207n0:713_0: Tamhā so ākulī katvā gantvā paṇḍavapabbataṃ.
anya-e1207n0:725_0: Dhammaṃ desehi mayhanti buddho hutvā anuttaro.
anya-e1207n0:740_0: Baliṃ dammī’ti gantvāna disvā tā dīpaduttamaṃ.
anya-e1207n0:742_0: Dovo’ti saññāya udaggacittā pāyāsapātiṃ pavarassa datvā;
anya-e1207n0:743_0: “Āsiṃsanā ijjhiyathā hi mayhaṃ tuyhampi sā sāmi samijjhitū’ti.”
anya-e1207n0:745_0: Icce’vaṃ vacanaṃ vatvā gatā tamhā varaṅganā;
anya-e1207n0:799_0: Atha naṃ abbhutaṃ disvā mahāpañño vicintayi.
anya-e1207n0:801_0: “Maṃsalohitamaṭṭhi ca nahārū ca taco ca me;
anya-e1207n0:814_0: Vījayanto ṭhito tattha mandaṃ mandaṃ tigāvutaṃ.
anya-e1207n0:826_0: Vattamāne tadā māro pāpimā iti cintayi.
anya-e1207n0:884_0: Tampi disvā sasoko so gantvā dhīrassa santikaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:890_0: Ko sakkhī’ti pavutto so ime sabbe’ti sakkhino;
anya-e1207n0:896_0: Ko te siddhattha sakkhī’ti atha tenā’tulena’pi;
anya-e1207n0:914_0: Taṃ mārasenaṃ sabhayaṃ sasokaṃ palāyamānaṃ iti devasaṅghā;
anya-e1207n0:915_0: Disvāna mārassa parājayo’yaṃ jayo’ti siddhattha kumārakassa.
anya-e1207n0:945_0: Ñatvā tāsaṃ vitakkaṃ taṃ sametuṃ santamānaso.
anya-e1207n0:961_0: Mūle’pi rājayatanassa tassa tasmiṃ samāpattisukhampi vindaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:977_0: Āsevaṃ takkaṇaṃ dhammaṃ imaṃ me paṭivijjhituṃ.
anya-e1207n0:986_0: Dānaṃ nāma na dinnañca natthi sīlaṃ arakkhitaṃ.
anya-e1207n0:992_0: Chejjādiṃ pāpunattena pāramī natthi kāci me.
anya-e1207n0:995_0: Na kampittha ayaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ sarato’pi ca.
anya-e1207n0:998_0: Na kampittha pakampittha pacchime pana yāmake.
anya-e1207n0:1019_0: Nassati vata bho loko iti loko vinassati.
anya-e1207n0:1050_0: Yasassī migadāyamuttamaṃ tahiṃ tapassī atha pañcavaggiyā.
anya-e1207n0:1070_0: Samatthā nahi saṇṭhātuṃ sakāya katikāya te;
anya-e1207n0:1184_0: Atha yodhasahassena tampi pesesi so’pi ca;
anya-e1207n0:1220_0: Suṇitvā madhuraṃ tassa giraṃ lokahite rato;
anya-e1207n0:1229_0: Dine dine vasitvāna yojane yojane jino;
anya-e1207n0:1230_0: Dvīhi māsehi sampatto buddho jātapuraṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1207n0:1242_0: Susajjitaṃ puraṃ patvā munindo taṃ manoramaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:1257_0: Idaṃ vatvā nisīdiṃsu katvā te purato tato;
anya-e1207n0:1260_0: Tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā “na maṃ vandanti ñātayo;
anya-e1207n0:1276_0: Bhūsite’kāsi te sabbe sākiya’ akaruṃ tathā.
anya-e1207n0:1311_0: “Sakyapuṅgava te ne’sa vaṃso mā cara mā cara;
anya-e1207n0:1312_0: Vaṃse putte’karājā’pi na piṇḍāya carī pure.”
anya-e1207n0:1336_0: Ahampa’jja na gaccheyyaṃ save bimbāya mandiraṃ.
anya-e1207n0:1345_0: Pakampitā hemalatā’va bimbā bimbadharā satthu samīpa’māga.
anya-e1207n0:1350_0: Rājā satthu pavedesi bimbāyā’ti bahuṃ guṇaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:1362_0: “Sukhā’va chāyā te me”ti uggirantaṃ giraṃ piyaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:1363_0: “Dāyajjaṃ me dadāhī’ti dāyajjaṃ me dadāhi ca”.
anya-e1207n0:1394_0: Gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ dhammaṃ suṇitvā vimalaṃ varaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:1404_0: Vihāre pavare datvā kārāpetvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1207n0:1424_0: Citraṃ gandhakuṭiṃ varaṃ suvipulaṃ kāresi bhūsekharaṃ.
anya-e1207n0:1447_0: Dūtaṃ pāhesi so satthā sutvā dūtassa sāsanaṃ.
anya-e1207n0:1453_0: Kumārā purato satthu nikkhamiṃsu surā yathā.
anya-e1207n0:1490_0: Iti vipulayaso so tassa dhammaṃ kathetvā,
anya-e1207n0:1608_0: Citaṃ yaṃ racayantena jinassa caritaṃ mayā;
anya-e1207n0:1612_0: Tena saddhiṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ vindanto mahatiṃ siriṃ.
anya-e1207n0:1623_0: Vyākato tena buddho yaṃ hessatīti anāgate;
anya-e1207n0:1626_0: Saṃsāre saṃsaranto hi kapparukkho ca pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e1207n0:1636_0: Mocayitvā varaṃ khemaṃ pāpuṇyeṃ sivaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e1207n0:1645_0: Therena racitaṃ etaṃ sabbha saṃsevitaṃ sadā.
